Cloudean Debuts with Worldwide Shared, Email, and WordPress Hosting! (Shared as Cheap as €0.998/month!)

cloudean, email, shared, wordpress December 16, 2020 @ 12:01 am, by raindog308

Welcome, Cloudean!  This is their first offer on LEB and they’re bringing us a range of shared, email,  and WordPress-focused offers.  They promise in-house support, 24×7 response, painless migration, and four nines (99.99%) uptime – that’s less than 5 mins a month downtime!

They’ve been in the business since 2016 and have a pretty robuts setup: CloudLinux/CageFS, MailChannels for email, Softtaculous, JetBackup, and cPanel.

Cloudean is an Indian company (AAG-3960) and here’s what they had to say about themselves:

“Cloudean Infotech is a technology company that administer solution and environment that puts our customers in the finest position to succeed.  We are providing premium managed services since 2016; powered by enterprise grade cloud infrastructure providers which can assure performance, low-latency and stability for our clients.
Our existing clients consists of E-commerce and high traffic news portal; we work as extension of their team and keeping client’s business website loading fast and secure.  We’ll craft a secure end-to-end solution that meets your current business needs and supports your future goals to drive results.
we are always stretching ourselves and striving to become the best versions of ourselves.
We perform lot of research and experiments in our free time which do assure ongoing enhancement of our services and clients business need.
We’re Pro-Active. our team take initiative and patches any possible issues on highest priority.
A team of friendly and competent support engineers – who are always willing to help. Have your doubts clarified and issues resolved in minutes, not days.  Looking forward to serve your business needs.”
